_header: From all misrule in youth exercised by me
Title(s): ‘A praier for janivere personis’; ‘Delicta iuuentutis mee’
_description: ‘A praier for janivere personis’, ‘Delicta iuuentutis mee’ — three couplets

Lam541.Transcription:
From all mysrewle in ȝowthe exercisyd by mepurge my sowle ihesu
                    þat y may endeles be with þeCast me neuer a wey ihesu in my olde
                    agebut when my wites fayle brynge my sowle to þi stageFrom my
                    nowun gilte clense me ihesu benigneAnd from offense of Wodir þat y
                    browthe behynde
Lam541.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Five Middle English Verse Prayers from Lambeth MS. 541.” 
             Neophilologus
         38 (1954): 36-41: 39.
